displayProperties.description: Multiple final blows with this weapon grant Devour to the wielder.
displayProperties.name: Violent Reanimation

displayProperties.description: This weapon deals bonus damage to suspended targets. Gain faster draw time for a short duration when you suspend a target from any source or damage a suspended target with this weapon.
displayProperties.name: Silkbound Slayer

displayProperties.description: Igniting nearby targets partially replenishes fuel. This weapon refills itself from reserves upon gaining maximum fuel.
displayProperties.name: High Octane

displayProperties.description: Grants bonus range and stability. Dealing a final blow or absorbing a Remnant grants additional increased weapon range, as well as increased mobility and handling for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Refined Soul

displayProperties.description:
Destroying vehicles and constructs or breaking target shields grants this weapon bonus reload speed and charge rate.

Constructs include barricades, turrets, Stasis crystals, and other objects created in the field.
displayProperties.name: Sundering

displayProperties.description: Upon taking damage from a target, quickly guard or aim down sights with this weapon to gain bonus mobility, handling, and charge rate for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Advanced Reflexes

displayProperties.description: Landing multiple hits turns your next shot into a homing micro-rocket.
displayProperties.name: Nanotech Tracer Rockets

displayProperties.description:
Defeating targets or dealing damage with this weapon gradually increases range, stability, handling, and reload speed.

Swords gain increased charge rate and guard resistance.
displayProperties.name: Field-Tested

displayProperties.description: When an ally dies or you reach critical health, this weapon's magazine refills, and it gains bonus range, charge rate, and handling.
displayProperties.name: Dragon's Vengeance

displayProperties.description: Being near allies slowly builds up a partial emergency ammo refill for the next time this weapon runs out of ammo. Emergency ammo amount increases with time spent near allies.
displayProperties.name: Nano-Munitions

displayProperties.description: This weapon has increased range and handling for the top half of the magazine, while rounds from the bottom half of the magazine deal increased damage.
displayProperties.name: Crossing Over

displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant your projectiles tracking and increase reload speed. Dealing further damage extends the duration.
displayProperties.name: Beacon Rounds
